name: FetchApplicationDetails
description:
Fetch application details using application or form instance ID.

Use this tool to retrieve details of an application by providing either the application ID or the submitted form instance ID. If both are provided, the application ID is prioritized. Requires 'candidatesRead' permission.

parameters.name: application_or_form_instance_id
parameters.description: Provide either an application ID or a submitted form instance ID in JSON format. If both are provided, the application ID is prioritized.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
